list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a line on the surface of something along which it has split without breaking into separate parts.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a hairline crack down the middle of the glass
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một đường chân tóc nứt xuống giữa kính

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sudden sharp or explosive noise.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một vết nứt lớn của sấm sét

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a joke, typically a critical or unkind one.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he knew about the gossip and would make the odd crack
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh biết về tin đồn và sẽ làm cho vết nứt lẻ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an attempt to gain or achieve something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I thought I had a crack at winning
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi nghĩ rằng tôi đã có một vết nứt trong chiến thắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hard, crystalline form of cocaine broken into small pieces and smoked.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy sử dụng crack và cocaine

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: break or cause to break without a complete separation of the parts.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the ice all over the lake had cracked
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Băng khắp hồ đã bị nứt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make or cause to make a sudden sharp or explosive sound.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a shot cracked across the ridge
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một cú bắn bị nứt trên sườn núi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: find a solution to; decipher or interpret.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a hacker cracked the codes used in internet software
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một hacker đã bẻ khóa các mã được sử dụng trong phần mềm internet

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he cracked jokes which she didn't find very funny
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh bẻ những trò đùa mà cô không thấy rất buồn cười

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: decompose (hydrocarbons) by heat and pressure with or without a catalyst to produce lighter hydrocarbons, especially in oil refining.
very good, especially at a specified activity or in a specified role.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy là một vụ nứt
